<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Steam Mephit](/Monsters.aspx?ID=662)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These brash and arrogant creatures are among the more energetic mephits. They are quick to nominate themselves the leaders of any group, barking out orders in shrill, high-pitched voices and insisting on having everything done their way. Even when they aren't bossing others around, the constant hiss of steam escaping from their pores ensures that there is never a quiet moment.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 17

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Steam Mephit](/Monsters.aspx?ID=662)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +3; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), steam vision

**Languages**
[Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -2

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Steam Vision** The steam mephit ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from mist and steam.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 19
([fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 2 (in boiling water or steam))

**Immunities**
bleed, fire, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Weaknesses**
cold 3

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 25 feet, swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 slashing

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 17
- **2nd**
[Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210)

**Boiling Rain** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The steam mephit calls down a rain boiling water that surrounds them in a 10-foot emanation. Creatures in the area take 2d8 fire damage (DC 17 basic Reflex save), and small unattended flames (such as torches) are extinguished.

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The steam mephit spits a cloud of steam in a 15-foot cone that deals 2d6 fire damage to each creature within the area (DC 17 basic Reflex save). The steam mephit can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
